thread.title: Zak retires: Cricket fraternity pour in their respects on twitter
thread.title_full: Zak retires: Cricket fraternity pour in their respects on twitter - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Zak retires: Cricket fraternity pour in their respects on twitter
text:
*New Delhi:* Iconic Sachin Tendulkar and limited overs captain Mahendra Singh Dhoni yesterday led the bandwagon of former and current cricketers praising Zaheer Khan , who ended his international career yesterday.
*Sachin Tendulkar*
The 37-year-old Zaheer decided to call time on his international career with immediate effect ... Â»
